languages.text: "Ты осталась одна, без семьи и своего волшебного камня. Хочешь выжить — становись моим санкционированным питомцем".
"You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."
languages.original_text: "Ты осталась одна, без семьи и своего волшебного камня. Хочешь выжить — становись моим санкционированным питомцем".

traits.locale_text: "You were left alone, without your kinsmen and your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."
"You were left alone, without your kinsmen and your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."
"You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."
"You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."
"You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."

languages.text: “现在你可算是孤家寡人了，既没有族人，也没有灵魂石。如果你还想活下去，就成为我的宠物吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."

traits.locale_text: “现在你可算是孤家寡人了，既没有族人，也没有灵魂石。如果你还想活下去，就成为我的宠物吧。”

languages.text: «Ahora estás sola, sin tu gente ni tu joya espiritual. Si quieres sobrevivir, será como mi mascota personal».
languages.original_text: "You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora estás sola, sin tu gente ni tu joya espiritual. Si quieres sobrevivir, será como mi mascota personal».

languages.text: « Vous êtes désormais seule, sans pierre-esprit et abandonnée par vos semblables. Si vous voulez survivre... vous n'avez pas d'autre choix que de devenir ma xénos de compagnie. »
languages.original_text: "You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes désormais seule, sans pierre-esprit et abandonnée par vos semblables. Si vous voulez survivre... vous n'avez pas d'autre choix que de devenir ma xénos de compagnie. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid jetzt allein, ohne Eure Leute oder Euren Seelenstein. Wenn Ihr überleben wollt, könnt Ihr mein sanktioniertes Haustier werden."
languages.original_text: "You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid jetzt allein, ohne Eure Leute oder Euren Seelenstein. Wenn Ihr überleben wollt, könnt Ihr mein sanktioniertes Haustier werden."

languages.text: 「お前は今、同族も魂縛石もなく孤独だ。生き延びたいのなら…{mf|俺|私}公認のペットなれ」
languages.original_text: "You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は今、同族も魂縛石もなく孤独だ。生き延びたいのなら…{mf|俺|私}公認のペットなれ」

languages.text: "Artık tek başınasın, ne soydaşların ne de ruh taşın yanında. Hayatta kalmak istiyorsan benim onaylı evcil hayvanım ol."
languages.original_text: "You are now alone, without your kin or your spirit stone. If you want to survive — then be my sanctioned pet."

traits.locale_text: "Artık tek başınasın, ne soydaşların ne de ruh taşın yanında. Hayatta kalmak istiyorsan benim onaylı evcil hayvanım ol."
